text: Intestinal Hypoxia and Infarction 5-10 minutes Separation of apical villous epithelium from basement membrane 30-60 minutes | Loss of serosal mesothelial cells with fibrin exudation a 1-3 hours Complete loss of villous epithelium with collapse of the mesenchymal core of the villi and luminal haemorrhage and fibrin exudation Necrosis of crypt epithelial cells \\ Necrosis of smooth muscle cells - 1
